title: varuvEn vandunnai
sahitya:
varuvEn vandunnai vandanai purivEn murugA undanadu urutuNai pera nAn


anupallavi

  tiruvEragham adil guruparanAit-tigazh parama krpAkaranE bhakta paripAlakanE


caraNam    immakhilam adanil iNaiyaDi unadai nambi varum anbarai naliya viDAdaNaiyum
semmanE unnaDi sErum aDiyEniDam un manam urugi viDum enrurudiyAik-karudi
